players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "This is terrible! Charlie's gone already. We need to work together here - has anyone noticed anything suspicious? I'm looking at everyone equally right now."
Diana: "Based on my observations from last night, I believe Bob is the mafioso. We should vote for him to protect the town."
You: "Diana's observation makes sense. I'm leaning towards voting for Bob."

Bob: "Diana, that's a very bold claim to make so early. If you're the detective, you're painting a huge target on yourself. And Alice, you're awfully quick to jump on board without any evidence. This feels like either reckless play or coor..."
You: "I agree with Diana. Let's vote for Bob to protect the town."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob

players.name: Diana
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Bob: "This is terrible! Charlie's gone already. We need to work together here - has anyone noticed anything suspicious? I'm looking at everyone equally right now."
You: "Based on my observations from last night, I believe Bob is the mafioso. We should vote for him to protect the town."
Alice: "Diana's observation makes sense. I'm leaning towards voting for Bob."

Bob: "Diana, that's a very bold claim to make so early. If you're the detective, you're painting a huge target on yourself. And Alice, you're awfully quick to jump on board without any evidence. This feels like either reckless play or coor..."
